org.mozilla.javascript.arrays

Class ExternalDoubleArray

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mozilla.javascript.arrays.ExternalArray
      • org.mozilla.javascript.arrays.ExternalDoubleArray
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public final class ExternalDoubleArray
extends ExternalArray
    An implementation of the external array using an array of "double"s. Only "number" types may be set in the array. position() of the specified array will be used for the first object in the array, and "remaining()" will be used to determine the length.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
